objects.description: [NotPetya](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0006) disrupted manufacturing facilities supplying vaccines, resulting in a halt of production and the inability to meet demand for specific vaccines.(Citation: Bloomberg Dec 2019)

external_references.description: David Voreacos, Katherine Chinglinsky, Riley Griffin. (2019, December 03). Merck Cyberattack’s $1.3 Billion Question: Was It an Act of War?. Retrieved December 6, 2019.
